item.title: About
item.description: Iâ€™m a compute architect at NVIDIA, focused on accelerating Deep Learning software stack on cutting-edge GPUs such as Hopper and Blackwell. Currently, I am engaged in developing a deep learning compiler and enhancing end-to-end training performance. In my spare time, I maintain a keen interest in emerging deep learning algorithms, including embodied intelligence, AI4Science, LLM and graphics.
